title: Detectives Arrest Suspect in College Park Homicide
body:
*****Spanish Translation Follows*****Homicide Unit detectives identified and
arrested a man in connection with a homicide that occurred in College Park on
Sunday. The suspect is 26-year-old Tyree Stewart of the 9000 block of Edmonston
Road in Greenbelt. The victim is 26-year-old Tyesha Henry of Greenbelt.On July
5, at approximately 11:30 am, patrol officers responded to
a hotel located in the 9100 block of Baltimore Avenue for the report of an
unresponsive female. When they arrived, they found Henry suffering from an
apparent gunshot wound inside a hotel room. She was pronounced dead on the
scene.The
preliminary investigation revealed that this is a domestic related homicide.
Detectives are still working to establish a motive that led up to the shooting.
Stewart is charged with first and second degree murder and related charges. He
is in the custody of the Department of Corrections.  Anyone with information on this case is
asked to call the Homicide Unit at 301-772-4925. Callers wishing to remain
anonymous may call Crime Solvers at 1-866-411-TIPS (8477), or go online
at www.pgcrimesolvers.com, or use the “P3
Tips” mobile app (search “P3 Tips” in the Apple Store or Google Play to
download the app onto your mobile device.)*****Spanish Translation Follows*****Detectives Arrestan a Sospechoso de Homicidio en
College ParkDetectives de la Unidad de Homicidios
identificaron y arrestaron a un individuo en conexión a un homicidio ocurrido
el domingo en College Park. El sospechoso es Tyree Stewart, de 26 años de edad
y vecino de la cuadra 9000 de Edmonston Road en Greenbelt. La víctima fue
identificada como Tyesha Henry, de 26 años de edad y vecina de Greenbelt.El 5 de julio, a eso de las 11:30 de
la mañana, oficiales de patrulla acudieron al hotel ubicado en la cuadra 9100
de Baltimore Avenue tras recibir información sobre una mujer sin señales de
vida. Al llegar, hallaron a una mujer con una herida de bala dentro de una
habitación del hotel. A ésta le declararon muerta en la escenaLa investigación preliminar reveló
que se trataba de un homicidio de naturaleza doméstica. Nuestros detectives
continúan investigando para establecer un motivo que llevase al asesinato. A Stewart
se le acusa por asesinato en primer y segundo grado, entre otros delitos. Este
se encuentra bajo la custodia del Departamento de Corrección.

Prince George's County Police
